system.description: You store one spell that you can normally cast in a wooden quarterstaff. Only one such spell can be stored in a staff at a time, and you cannot have more than one spellstaff at any given time. You can cast the stored spell from the staff as though it were prepared, but it does not count against your normal allotment for the day. You use up any material components when you store the spell in the spellstaff.

components.materialDescription: The wooden quarterstaff that stores the spell (focus).
